Special Thanks

We give our heartfelt gratitude to the many people who have made Damai Designs possible. From the skilled artisans who bring each piece to life, to the partners, supporters, and friends who have guided and encouraged us along the way - your contributions are woven into every step of our journey.

settings.title: Ricardo Solis
settings.text: Ricardo Sol√≠s is a professional photographer, audiovisual and music producer based in Mexico City. His work focuses on fashion, commercial photography, product, and digital content, combining an aesthetic vision with a strong narrative sensitivity. With over 10 years of experience, Ricardo is a versatile creative who transforms ideas into powerful and memorable images.
